application.name: cnetadd
application.brief: Adds images to an Isis3 control network file.

description.p: This program takes an input list of cubes and sees if they can be added to an existing Isis3 control network file.

parameter.name: FROMLIST
parameter.brief: List of ISIS3 input cubes in the control net.
parameter.description: A text file containing one column of ISIS3 cube file names. Every file used in the control net file should be represented in this list. The cubes must be available for the program to open.

parameter.name: NETWORK
parameter.description: Use this parameter to specify the control network file containing the information.

parameter.name: FROMLIST2
parameter.brief: List of ISIS3 input cubes to add to the control net.
parameter.description: A text file containing one column of ISIS3 cube file names. The cubes must be available for the program to open.

parameter.name: TO
parameter.description: Use this parameter to specify the control network file to output the information to.

parameter.name: LOG
parameter.description: This optional log file contains information about which files were added to the control net and which ones were not.
